com.salesforce.androidsdk.security

Class ScreenLockManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.security.ScreenLockManager

  • public class ScreenLockManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages if the app should be locked.
    Author:
    bpage

public void storeMobilePolicy(UserAccount account,

        Stores the mobile policy for the org upon user login.

        account - the newly add account
        screenLockRequired - if the account requires screen lock or not

                              boolean screenLockRequired,
                              int timeout)
        Stores the mobile policy for the org upon user login.
        Parameters:
        account - the newly add account
        screenLockRequired - if the account requires screen lock or not
        timeout - timeout in milliseconds
